sentences.en: ‘She’s only 15.’ ‘ That settles it ! We’re not taking her with us!’
sentences.cn: “她才15岁。”“那好，我们不带她去喽！”

sentences.en: "We want to settle all matters at the negotiating table," he said.
sentences.cn: 他说：“我们想在谈判桌上解决所有问题。”

sentences.en: Albert settled himself on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 阿尔伯特在沙发安坐下来。

sentences.en: Attempts are being made to settle the dispute by diplomatic means.
sentences.cn: 正在努力通过外交途径解决争端。

sentences.en: Children would settle disputes by trading punches or insults in the schoolyard.
sentences.cn: 儿童会通过在操场上对打或互骂的方式解决争端。

sentences.en: Forensic tests should settle the question of whether Bates was actually present at the scene of the crime.
sentences.cn: 法医检验应该能够解决贝茨是否在犯罪现场的问题。

sentences.en: had to settle for a lower wage than the one requested.
sentences.cn: 不得不接受一个比所需低的工资

sentences.en: He refused to settle for anything that was second best.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝退而求其次。

sentences.en: He settled down as a farmer with a family.
sentences.cn: 他与一家人安顿下来务农

sentences.en: I have to settle my affairs before leaving here.
sentences.cn: 离开这儿以前,我得把一些私人的事情安排妥当.

sentences.en: If you care to step outside, we can settle this.
sentences.cn: 如果你愿意出去比试比试, 我们一会儿就能把问题解决了.

sentences.en: It enabled its members to settle their differences without recourse to war.
sentences.cn: 这样，其成员就可以不必诉诸战争来解决分歧。

sentences.en: It’s settled then. I’ll go back to the States in June.
sentences.cn: 那就这么定了，我六月份回美国。

sentences.en: It's time to settle this mano-a-mano.
sentences.cn: 现在是当面解决这个问题的时候了。

sentences.en: Many Jewish people settled in the Lower East Side.
sentences.cn: 许多犹太人在（纽约曼哈顿）下东区定居。

sentences.en: Nothing’s settled yet.
sentences.cn: 一切都还未定。

sentences.en: One day I'll want to settle down and have a family.
sentences.cn: 总有一天，我会想安定下来，成个家。

sentences.en: She breathed deeply to settle her nerves (= stop herself from feeling worried or frightened ) .
sentences.cn: 她深深地吸了口气平静自己的情绪。

sentences.en: She offered to settle a legacy on Katharine.
sentences.cn: 她提出要把一笔遗产留给凯瑟琳。

sentences.en: Tap each one firmly on your work surface to settle the mixture.
sentences.cn: 在工作台上逐个轻轻敲紧，让混合物变得密实。

sentences.en: The groups had historic scores to settle with each other.
sentences.cn: 这两个集团之间有几笔旧账要了结。

sentences.en: The man let his eyes settle upon Cross's face.
sentences.cn: 那名男子的目光落在了克罗斯的脸上。

sentences.en: They agreed to try to settle their dispute by negotiation.
sentences.cn: 他们同意通过谈判来努力解决纠纷。

sentences.en: They might be willing to settle out of court (= come to an agreement without going to a court of law ) .
sentences.cn: 他们或许会愿意庭外和解。

sentences.en: Thirty-thousand-million dollars is needed to settle the refugees.
sentences.cn: 安顿这些难民需要耗资300亿美元。

sentences.en: We hope the factions will be able to settle their differences (= agree to stop arguing ) by peaceful means.
sentences.cn: 我们希望各派系能以和平方式解决分歧。

sentences.en: When the children had settled, Miss Brown gave out the new reading books.
sentences.cn: 孩子们静下来后，布朗小姐给他们发新的故事书。

words.tran_cn: 解决，处理；[会计] 结算；沉降；殖民

phrases.tran_cn: 平静：变得不紧张或安静
勉强接受：尽管不完全满意也能接受

trans.tran_en: a seat, for two or more people, usually made of wood with a high back and arms, and sometimes having a storage space in the boxlike seat

trans.tran_cn: 结束（分歧），庭外和解，结（账），（使）坐下，（使）沉降，安排好，定居，注视着，降落
trans.tran_en: to end an argument or solve a disagreement

trans.tran_cn: 安家； 飞落， 停留； 安定； 下沉； 平静， 稳定
trans.tran_en: to decide what you are going to do, especially so that you can make definite arrangements

trans.tran_cn: 解决，调停；安排；支付，结算，偿还；使安定
trans.tran_en: to end an argument or solve a disagreement
